chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.

one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface

forall (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), leaderLogs (update_elections_data_client_request me st client id c) = leaderLogs (fst st)

RaftNetHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => let (state0, pkts) := handleMessage src me m state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> name -> msg -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftNetHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface

```coq
intros me st client id c.
unfold update_elections_data_client_request.
destruct st as [ed rd].
remember (handleClientRequest me rd client id c) as hcr_result.
destruct hcr_result as [[out st'] ps].
remember (log rd) as rd_log.
remember (log st') as st'_log.
destruct (Nat.ltb (length rd_log) (length st'_log)).
- apply handleClientRequest_log in Heqhcr_result.
  destruct Heqhcr_result as [_ [Heq_log | [e [Heq_log _]]]].
  + rewrite Heq_log. reflexivity.
  + destruct st'_log; inversion Heq_log.
- reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros me st client id c. unfold update_elections_data_client_request. destruct st as [ed rd]. remember (handleClientRequest me rd client id c) as hcr_result. destruct hcr_result as [[out st'] ps]. remember (log rd) as rd_log. remember (log st') as st'_log. destruct (Nat.ltb (length rd_log) (length st'_log)). - apply handleClientRequest_log in Heqhcr_result. destruct Heqhcr_result as [_ [Heq_log | [e [Heq_log _]]]]. + rewrite Heq_log. reflexivity. + destruct st'_log; inversion Heq_log. - reflexivity.
